name: Train Track Travellers
description:
Probably one of the worst games I've made, since I made it in 24 hours and I didn't fix any major problems afterwards. If want the best experience, play the Windows version, otherwise you will see rendering and performance issues.

Also it doesn't get hard for a really long time...

Controls:

  • A + D or arrows to move
  • W or up arrow to jump
  • S or down arrow to roll
  • Alternatively swipe screen to move and jump and slide

MUSIC:

Crime Time by Frank Schröter

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/9136-crime-time

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
